actions.committee: House Committee on Science and Astronautics
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Science and Astronautics.
Reported to House from the Committee on Science and Astronautics, H. Rept. 93-171.

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Aeronautical and Space Science
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Aeronautical and Space Science.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Aeronautical and Space Sciences with amendment, S. Rept. 93-179.
Measure passed Senate, amended, roll call #203 (90-5).
Conference report filed in House, H. Rept. 93-353.

official_title: An Act to authorize appropriations to the National Aeronautics and Space Administration for research and development, construction of facilities, and research and program management, and for other purposes.
short_title: National Aeronautics and Space Administration Authorization Act

summary.text: National Aeronautics and Space Administration Authorization Act - Authorizes appropriations to the National Aeronautics and Space Administration for research and development, construction of facilities, and research program management.

titles.title: National Aeronautics and Space Administration Authorization Act
A bill to authorize appropriations to the National Aeronautics and Space Administration for research and development, construction of facilities, and research and program management.

An Act to authorize appropriations to the National Aeronautics and Space Administration for research and development, construction of facilities, and research and program management, and for other purposes.
